Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check emails. Review any updates or communications from the EHR vendor.
Schedule a call with the EHR vendor to discuss the progress of system updates. Prepare a list of questions and concerns to address during the call.
Call with the EHR vendor to ensure updates are on track. Take detailed notes on the discussion for documentation.
Follow up with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss any technical issues or updates needed based on the vendor call.
Review system performance metrics post-implementation. Identify any anomalies or issues that need attention.
Email @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1 with a summary of the vendor call and any system performance concerns.
Document all interactions with the EHR vendor in the shared drive for future reference.
Browse industry news and updates on EHR systems to stay informed.
